sources.title: Florida Special (1936)
sources.description: Jack Oakie, Sally Eilers, Kent Taylor, Dwight Frye Co-written by S.J. Perelman and Laura Perelman

metadata.Plot: Newspaper reporter Bangs Carter and his rich buddy Wally Tucker end up on a train bound for Florida with jewel thieves and Wally's ex-girlfriend. Bangs falls for a passenger along the way as they try to catch the crooks.
metadata.Writer: Clarence Budington Kelland, David Boehm, Marguerite Roberts
metadata.Actors: Jack Oakie, Sally Eilers, Kent Taylor
